sentences.en: After we paid the phone bill there was little left in the kitty.
sentences.cn: 付掉电话费后,公共储金里剩下的钱不够了.

sentences.en: But you will not see your kitty's body type becoming human.
sentences.cn: 但是你们不会看到小猫的体型变成人类.

sentences.en: Each month the total prize kitty is £13.5 million.
sentences.cn: 每个月的彩池奖金总额达1,350万英镑。

sentences.en: Good morning, Kitty. Good morning, Ben. Good morning, Eddie. How are you?
sentences.cn: 早上好, 基蒂. 早上好, 本. 早上好, 埃迪. 你好 吗 ?

sentences.en: In the fall, they returned to Kitty Hawk.
sentences.cn: 秋天, 他们又回到基蒂霍克.

sentences.en: Kitty Aldridge has sacrificed all for her first film.
sentences.cn: 姬蒂·奥尔德里奇为自己的首部影片牺牲了一切。

sentences.en: Kitty and Ben have packed all their books and toys in boxes.
sentences.cn: 基蒂和本把他们所有的书和玩具装到盒子里.

sentences.en: Kitty deviled her mother for a doll.
sentences.cn: 基蒂缠着她妈妈要个洋娃娃.

sentences.en: Kitty kept her hand casually and frequently on the horn.
sentences.cn: 基蒂随便而频繁地按着喇叭.

sentences.en: Kitty was down on the junior typist.
sentences.cn: 基蒂仇视那个年轻的打字员。

sentences.en: Kitty was on cloud nine when she heard the good news.
sentences.cn: 吉蒂听到那个好消息时,非常高兴.

sentences.en: Kitty, what do you usually do with your aunt?
sentences.cn: 基蒂，你通常与你的姑母做什么？

sentences.en: Kitty: Do you think you can get away with it?
sentences.cn: 凯蒂: 你觉得能蒙混过关 吗 ?

sentences.en: Kitty's family was unworldly, unimpressed by power, or money.
sentences.cn: 基蒂一家清心寡欲，淡泊金钱与权力。

sentences.en: So you can see your Fido or Kitty on TV.
sentences.cn: 于是你就可以在电视上看到你的Fido或者Kitty了.

sentences.en: Three days into production, the kitty had run dry.
sentences.cn: 才投产3天凑集的钱就用光了。

sentences.en: You haven't put any money in the kitty for three weeks.
sentences.cn: 你有3个星期没往里凑钱了。

phrases.tran_cn: 小鹰号航空母舰 （战斗群） （美）；基蒂霍克（美国北卡罗莱纳州一小村庄）

trans.tran_cn: 赌注，共同的资金，<口>小猫
